description: This project highlights essential Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that improve your experience in GitHub Copilot. You'll get a breakdown of each server’s purpose, configuration steps, and usage examples — from automated context syncing to enhanced code navigation. Designed to help you get more out of GitHub Copilot with minimal setup.
title: Top MCP Servers for GitHub Copilot
short_description: Explore key MCP servers that extend and optimize GitHub Copilot
